column1: Table #5:  The 10 highest and lowest jurisdictions for selected characteristics of the prison population, yearend 2000.
Contact:  Allen Beck or Paige Harrison
Table 5.  The 10 highest and lowest jurisdictions for selected characteristics of the prison population, yearend 2000.
a/The number of prisoners with a sentence of more than 1 year per 100,000 residents in the
State population. The Federal Bureau of Prisons and the District of Columbia are excluded.
b/The average annual percent change from 1990 to 2000.
